tool_description: An API that delivers One-Time Passwords (OTPs) through WhatsApp for authentication and verification.
name: Send OTP via WhatsApp
title: Send OTP via WhatsApp

api_list.name: Send OTP Code
api_list.description:
The method is used to send an OTP code to a WhatsApp account.

**Example Message:**
Your verification code is 1234.

**Response Codes:**
[1] The OTP code was successfully sent.
[2] The phone number is wrong.
[3] The OTP code is wrong.
[4]  The title is wrong.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: The OTP Code to send to the user should only be numbers and be between 3 and 20 digits.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: The user's WhatsApp phone number, along with the country code should be provided to receive the OTP code.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The title of your project, company, or website as shown in the message, should have 3 to 15 letters. You can only use English letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and dots (.).

api_list.name: Check Whatsapp
api_list.description:
The method checks WhatsApp account availability on a phone number.

**Response Codes:**
[0] WhatsApp is not available on that phone number.
[1] WhatsApp is available on that phone number.
[2] The phone number is wrong.

required_parameters.name: tel
required_parameters.description: The phone number, along with the country code should be provided to receive the OTP code.
